name: Soundst Social Buttons
author: Sound Strategies

sections.description: This plugin will add a Facebook, Twitter and email share buttons after the body content on pages and posts
sections.installation:
1. Upload the soundst-social-buttons folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Adjust the plugin settings
sections.changelog:
= 0.0.1=
* Added functionality for facebook share button

0.0.2

  • Added functionality for twitter share button

0.0.3

  • Removed useless images check

0.0.4

  • removed extra space from image URL’s

0.0.5

  • email button addon
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the soundst-social-buttons folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Adjust the plugin settings
